invisible, and, change, over, time, ., Williams, :, the, basic, idea, be, that, when, the, global, economy, after, World, War, II, be, grow, very, rapidly, there, be, just, a, lot, of, competition, savings, that, people, have, accumulate, for, retirement, and, for, other, reason, and, that, imbalance, of, weak, investment, demand, globally, and, a, lot, of, savings, ,, which, Ben, Bernanke, might, -lrb-, or, might, not, happen, -rrb-, to, the, repayment, of, the, loan, after, you, husband, die, ,, you, can, be, sure, he, friend, have, have, the, same, thought, ., Read, :, my, brother, , publish, :, July, 1, ,, 2016, 9:52, a.m., ET, large, racial, and, gender, wage, gap, in, the, U.S., remain, by, white, man, be, not, the, biggest, earner, --, at, least, ,, when, it, come, to, hourly, wages, ., last, year, ,, the, average, hourly, wages, for, asian, man, outstrip, all, other, group, ., the, hourly, earnings, of, asian, man, -lrb-, $, 24, -rrb-, outpace, the, $, 21, a, hour, earn, by, white, man, ,, accord, to, a, report, release, Friday, by, the, Pew, Research, Center, ,, a, nonprofit, think, tank, in, Washington, ,, D.C., Black, and, Hispanic, man, earn, $, 15, and, $, 14, per, hour, ,, respectively, ,, compare, with, $, 21, for, white, man, ., ``, large, racial, and, gender, wage, gap, in, the, U.S., remain, ,, '', say, Eileen, Patten, ,, Pew, research, and, author, of, the, report, ., college-educated, black, and, hispanic, man, earn, around, 80, %, the, hourly, wages, of, white, college, educate, man, ., but, college-educated, asian, man, earn, $, 35, per, hour, ,, even, more, than, white, ,, college-educated, man, -lrb-, $, 32, -rrb-, ,, Patten, say, ., White, and, Asian, college-educated, woman, also, earn, roughly, 80, %, the, hourly, wages, of, white, college-educated, man, ., however, ,, black, and, hispanic, woman, with, a, college, degree, earn, only, about, 70, %, the, hourly, wages, of, similarly, educate, white, man, ., black, and, hispanic, man, have, make, no, progress, in, narrow, the, wage, gap, with, white, man, since, 1980, ,, the, Pew, report, add, ,, partly, because, there, have, be, no, improvement, in, the, hourly, earnings, of, white, ,, black, or, hispanic, man, over, this, 35-year, period, ., as, a, result, ,, african-american, man, earn, the, same, 73, %, share, of, white, man, 's, hourly, earnings, in, 1980, as, they, do, in, 2015, ,, and, hispanic, man, earn, 69, %, of, white, man, 's, earnings, in, 2015, compare, with, 71, %, in, 1980, ., do, not, miss, :, be, this, the, worst, tipper, in, America, ?, the, wage, gap, among, different, ethnic, group, can, be, partly, attribute, to, the, education, :, among, adult, age, 25, and, older, ,, 23, %, of, African-Americans, and, 15, %, of, Hispanics, have, a, bachelor, 's, degree, or, more, education, ,, versus, 36, %, of, whites, and, 53, %, of, asian, man, ., however, ,, wage, gap, by, gender, ,, race, and, ethnicity, persist, ., college-educated, black, and, hispanic, man, and, white, and, asian, woman, earn, roughly, 80, %, the, hourly, wages, of, white, college, educate, man, ., but, that, do, not, explain, the, disparity, in, wages, ,, particularly, between, the, sex, ., Education, and, workforce, experience, account, for, 8, %, of, the, gender, wage, gap, in, 2010, ,, while, industry, and, occupation, explain, 51, %, ,, a, January, 2016, report, by, the, National, Bureau, of, Economic, Research, ,, a, Washington, ,, d.c.-based, research, group, ,, find, ., the, gender, pay, gap, decline, much, more, slowly, at, the, top, of, the, wage, distribution, that, at, the, middle, or, the, bottom, ,, the, researcher, write, ., the, gender, pay, gap, be, narrower, than, anytime, on, record, ., on, a, weekly, basis, ,, however, ,, it, widen, in, 2015, ., the, ratio, of, woman, 's, to, man, 's, median, weekly, full-time, earnings, decline, from, 82.5, cent, on, the, dollar, in, 2014, to, 81.1, cent, on, the, dollar,
